mapper.insert: insert into mydata.population_in(province_id, city_id, population_in, time,from_province_id,from_city_id) values (#{provinceId}, #{cityId}, #{populationId}ï¼Œ#{time},#{fromProvinceId},#{fromCityId})
mapper.select: select * from mydata.population_in where city_id=#{cityId} and time=#{date}
